entry.title: Russia Strikes Odessa Port After Deal to Unblock Ukrainian Grain Exports
entry.content: The strike appeared to violate the terms of the agreement signed by Russia and Ukraine in Istanbul on Friday, which stipulated that both countries would refrain from attacking port facilities or civilian ships used for grain transport.

entry.title: Inside Saudi Arabia's Plan to Build a Skyscraper That Stretches for 75 Miles
entry.content: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman demanded something as ambitious as Egypt’s pyramids. What urban planners came up with in response are plans for the world’s largest structure.

entry.title: Zelensky Says No Cease-Fire Until Russia Returns Land
entry.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky in an interview acknowledged the cost exacted by Russia’s invasion on Western businesses and consumers, and he praised the country’s allies for continuing to enable Ukrainian resistance against a much more powerful foe.

entry.title: Europe Is Tested Anew, This Time by Energy, Inflation and Putin
entry.content: Russia’s threat to the gas supply combines with rising interest rates to endanger the EU’s economies, with German industry especially in the cross hairs. Political turmoil in Italy adds to risks.
